extendedInfo.description: A British romantic comedy by Jane Wenham-Jones, author of 'Perfect Alibis'.Laura Meredith never imagined herself appearing on TVâ sheâs too old, too flabby, too downright hormonal, and much too busy holding things together for her son, Stanley, after husband, Daniel, left her for a younger, thinner replacement.But best friend Charlotte is a determined woman and when Laura is persuaded on to a daytime show to talk about her PMT, everything changes. Suddenly thereâs a camera crew tracking her every move and Laura finds herself an unlikely star. Wined, dined, and pampered, she begins to see the charms of a younger partner herself. But as things hot up between her and gorgeous TV director, Cal, theyâre going downhill elsewhere. While Lauraâs caught up in a heady whirlwind of beauty treatments, makeovers and glamorous film locations, Charlotteâs husband, Roger, is concealing a guilty secret, Stanleyâs got problems at school, workâs piling up, and when Laura turns detective to protect Charlotteâs marriage, things go horribly wrong.The champagneâs flowing as Lauraâs prime time TV debut looks set to be a hit.
